attributes.action:
Make a law for public vote in to party leadership 
So public can choose
attributes.background:
Make a law for public vote in to party leadership so public can choose the party's leader not the MP public should have same rights as they have general election. If any partys leader have resigned so public can have they say 
Public must have the same rights

rejection.details: Procedures for electing the leader of a political party are a matter for the party concerned, not for the Government or Parliament.
